item.description: Hello and welcome to my world 🌎 I’m a Software Engineering Manager passionate about building loveable, reliable, and intuitive products. 🚀 I like talking about programming, developer workflow, and software design principles. 👩🏽‍💻 I am motivated to help people and teams grow as they solve real-world technological challenges. I’ve been building real time trading applications 📈 for the past 8 years. I know a few things about the financial domain.
